en.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
en.passiveDescription: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by {{24%//30%//36%//42%//48%}} for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

zh.name: 讨龙英杰谭
zh.passiveDescription: 主动切换角色时，新登场的角色攻击力提升{{24%//30%//36%//42%//48%}}，持续10秒。该效果每20秒只能触发一次。
